trans-unit.source: Represents the pre-defined types of claims that an entity can claim.
trans-unit.target: 表示实体可以声明的预定义声明类型。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to search for a particular type of claim in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> or to create a claim.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> 类在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> 中搜索特定类型的声明或创建一个声明。

trans-unit.source: To search for a particular type of claim in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.FindClaims%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method and use the properties of this class to specify the claim type for the `claimType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> 中搜索特定类型的声明，请使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.FindClaims%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> 方法并使用此类的属性为 `claimType` 参数指定声明类型。

trans-unit.source: When the constructor for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class is used to create a new claim, use the properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to specify the `claimType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> 类的构造函数创建新声明时，请使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> 类的属性指定 `claimType` 参数。

trans-unit.source: For many of the claim types, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class has static properties that return a claim of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 对于许多声明类型，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> 类都具有返回特定类型声明的静态属性。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.CreateHashClaim%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method returns a claim using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Hash%2A> claim type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.CreateHashClaim%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> 方法使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Hash%2A> 声明类型返回一个声明。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定匿名用户。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定匿名用户。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定关于标识是否经过身份验证的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定关于标识是否经过身份验证的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定对于实体的授权决定。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定对于实体的授权决定。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the country/region in which an entity resides.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体所在的国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a country/region in which an entity resides.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体所在的国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的出生日期。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的出生日期。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的 deny-only 安全标识符 (SID)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only SID for an entity.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的 deny-only SID。

trans-unit.source: A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.
trans-unit.target: deny-only SID 禁止指定的实体访问可保护对象。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定与计算机名称关联的 DNS 名称或者与 X.509 证书的使用者或颁发者的备用名称关联的 DNS 名称。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定与计算机名称关联的 DNS 名称或者与 X.509 证书的使用者或颁发者的备用名称关联的 DNS 名称。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/rsa。

trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定一个服务主体名称 (SPN) 声明。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/spn。

trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体所在的州或省份。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/stateorprovince。

trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的街道地址。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/streetaddress。

trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的姓氏。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 标识系统实体。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 标识系统实体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.System%2A> is typically used to identify the issuer of a claim when the issuer is the current application.
trans-unit.target: 当颁发者为当前应用程序时，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.System%2A> 通常用于标识声明的颁发者。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定一个指纹。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定一个指纹。

trans-unit.source: A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指纹是 X.509 证书的全局唯一 SHA-1 哈希。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a user principal name (UPN).
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定一个用户主体名称 (UPN)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies UPN.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定 UPN。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn。

trans-unit.source: // \<snippet1>
trans-unit.target: // \<snippet1>

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a URI.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定一个 URI。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/uri。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the Web page of an entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的网页。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the Web page of an entity.
trans-unit.target: 声明的 URI，该 URI 指定实体的网页。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的字符串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that contains the URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，其中包含 X.509 证书的可分辨名称声明的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 证书的可分辨名称声明的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that is used by X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: X.500 标准规定了用于定义 X.509 证书所使用的可分辨名称的方法。
